full_summary:
# International Call for Information - Electric Vehicle Charging Management Systems in Parking Lots
## Overview
As part of the Greening Government Initiative (GGI) and the Greening Fleet Working Group, the Government of Canada is circulating a Call for Information related to Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Management Systems in Parking Lots. Interested parties are invited to contribute answers or provide information on this topic by responding to the attached Call for Information documents.

## Details
* **Reference Number:** WS3812794464-Doc3812873917
* **Publication Date:** January 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 15, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Regions of Delivery:** Israel
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Information
* **Trade Agreements:** None

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Alexandra Nadeau
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Telephone: Not provided
Email: [alexandra.nadeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexandra.nadeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Instructions for Response
Interested parties should respond to the Call for Information by providing answers or information on the topic of EV Charging Management Systems in Parking Lots. Note that responses will not be sent to the Government of Canada, but rather, will be shared with GGI members upon request.

Attachments and additional information are not provided.

Note that the responses are not solicited for a tender but are an Assessment of interest in the technology. Despite the languages, the extracting information has been taken primarily in English with French versions’ brief summery: full french extracted text embedded below.

Readers, it is prudent to note that there are indeed lengthy summery follow up for comments however they are I para veteran position statusless content; idea overlapped instruction.
